nodes.text: Goaty-chickens were a type of small bipedal creature with brown fur and black eyes. In 10 BBY, the crime lord Dryden Vos kept the remains of a goaty-chicken on display in a case in his study on board his yacht, the First Light.

The corpse of a goaty-chicken first appeared in the 2018 Anthology series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. They were first identified in the current canon in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies", which was released by the Star Wars Kids Youtube channel in 2019.
